title: Karma
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:10.70] You're talking shit for the hell of it
[00:14.31] Addicted to betrayal, but you're relevant
[00:17.12] You're terrified to look down
[00:22.13] 'Cause if you dare, you'll see the glare
[00:25.19] Of everyone you burned just to get there
[00:27.58] It's coming back around
[00:32.27] And I keep my side of the street clean
[00:37.65] You wouldn't know what I mean
[00:42.80] 'Cause karma is my boyfriend
[00:45.03] Karma is a god
[00:46.54] Karma is the breeze in my hair on the weekend
[00:49.86] Karma's a relaxing thought
[00:51.79] Aren't you envious that for you it's not?
[00:54.48] Sweet like honey, karma is a cat
[00:57.00] Purring in my lap 'cause it loves me
[00:59.99] Flexing like a goddamn acrobat
[01:02.46] Me and karma vibe like that
[01:05.25] Spider-boy, king of thieves
[01:07.69] Weave your little webs of opacity
[01:10.39] My pennies made your crown
[01:14.94] Trick me once, trick me twice
[01:18.50] Don't you know that cash ain't the only price?
[01:21.26] It's coming back around
[01:25.59] And I keep my side of the street clean
[01:31.07] You wouldn't know what I mean
[01:35.99] 'Cause karma is my boyfriend
[01:38.54] Karma is a god
[01:39.80] Karma is the breeze in my hair on the weekend
[01:43.01] Karma's a relaxing thought
[01:45.39] Aren't you envious that for you it's not?
[01:47.61] Sweet like honey, karma is a cat
[01:50.32] Purring in my lap 'cause it loves me
[01:53.10] Flexing like a goddamn acrobat
[01:55.73] Me and karma vibe like that
[01:58.45] Ask me what I learned from all those years
[02:01.40] Ask me what I earned from all those tears
[02:03.82] Ask me why so many fade, but I'm still here
[02:07.82] (I'm still, I'm still here)
[02:11.35] 'Cause karma is the thunder
[02:12.92] Rattling your ground
[02:14.46] Karma's on your scent like a bounty hunter
[02:17.60] Karma's gonna track you down
[02:19.59] Step by step from town to town
[02:22.15] Sweet like justice, karma is a queen
[02:24.98] Karma takes all my friends to the summit
[02:28.29] Karma is the guy on the screen
[02:30.55] Coming straight home to me
[02:32.64] 'Cause karma is my boyfriend (karma is my boyfriend)
[02:34.84] Karma is a god
[02:36.04] Karma is the breeze in my hair on the weekend (weekend)
[02:38.84] Karma's a relaxing thought
[02:41.08] Aren't you envious that for you it's not?
[02:43.65] Sweet like honey, karma is a cat
[02:46.11] Purring in my lap 'cause it loves me
[02:48.57] Flexing like a goddamn acrobat
[02:51.92] Me and karma vibe like that
[02:55.32] Karma is my boyfriend
[02:58.54] Karma is a god
[03:01.76] 
[03:04.46] Karma's a relaxing thought
[03:08.93]
